name: Launch
tagline: Create fully functional apps with AI and real human support
description: Launch builds real products from a single prompt- frontend, backend, a built-in database, and live integrations. No Supabase. No Zapier. When you‚Äôre stuck, a real human helps you debug and ship. From idea to live app in minutes, with support you can trust.

name: Kombai
tagline: The first AI agent built for real-world frontend tasks
description: The first domain-specific AI for frontend tasks beyond prototypes. Build entire app UIs, refactor code, or create components from Figma, text, image or code. Understands your codebase. Works in your IDE. Vastly outperforms generic agents + frontier models.

name: Mocha
tagline: Build full-stack apps without coding. But this time it works
description: Mocha is an AI-powered no‚Äëcode app builder that turns your idea into a live website in minutes. No coding skills needed ‚Äì perfect for ambitious entrepreneurs.

name: Sparrow
tagline: The lightest and fastest platform for API testing
description: Sparrow is now lighter, faster, smarter, and AI-powered. From natural language API calls to self-hosting, it‚Äôs a complete package of modern API testing. Built for speed, clarity, and control‚Äîno clutter, just flow. Experience the new Sparrow.

name: GLM-4.5
tagline: Unifying agentic capabilities in one open model
description: GLM-4.5 is a new 355B parameter open-weight MoE model (32B active). It delivers state-of-the-art performance on reasoning, code, and agentic tasks. Both the 355B flagship and a 106B Air version are now available, featuring dual-mode inference.

name: Bucketly
tagline: What's on your bucket list? Track your lifetime goals
description: Bucketly is not yet another bucket list or todo app. Track goals and milestones in a fresh way.

name: Okibi
tagline: Lovable but for agents - build agents using simple prompts
description: A web app to build AI agents using simple prompts, You can think of it as Lovable but for Agents! Build automations and agents with no effort: üßë‚Äçüíª generate agent code üîÑ see agent's flow üåê one click to publish your agent üé® templates to get started easily

name: Gridapps Testimonials
tagline: All-in-one testimonial widgets to boost trust & conversions
description: Gridapps Testimonials helps to collect, manage, edit & showcase video testimonials with ease. From smart forms to studio editor, widgets, Wall of Love & case studies, everything you need to turn customer love into growth. Fast, powerful, and built for trust.

name: Boki by Hackmamba
tagline: Plan, write, and distribute authentic content that converts
description: Boki is your all-in-one content operations platform for planning, writing, and distributing authentic blog and social content. Start publishing human-written content that converts for free.

name: projectOS
tagline: the free resume builder that grabs attention
description: Have a short discussion with an AI model, after which you get a personalised resume and website. This is how you start grabbing attention of HR

name: Partnero AI
tagline: AI-powered affiliate and referral programs
description: Meet the first AI-powered affiliate & referral tracking platform. Build partner programs, discover affiliates, track with links or coupons, and automate payouts‚Äîall in one place. Everything you need to scale partnerships, minus the manual work.

name: Temporal + OpenAI Agents SDK
tagline: Build production-ready agents, fast.
description: Rate-limiting? Brittle tools? Rapid iteration? We‚Äôve got it handled. OpenAI Agents SDK + Temporal means your agents now remember state, bounce back from crashes, and survive real-world chaos without you writing error-handling and orchestration code.

name: Pond
tagline: Superhuman for texting
description: Pond is an AI-native messaging app (iMessage, WhatsApp). Solopreneurs, executives, salespeople, real estate agents and others use Pond to read and send texts at lightning speed.

name: Dynamic, adaptive documentation
tagline: AI-powered docs, tailored to every user‚Äôs individual needs
description: Create dynamic docs that use product data (like roles and plans) to adapt to user needs using cookies, feature flags and more. Plus, the new AI Assistant uses the same data ‚Äî and data from other sources via MCP ‚Äî to give personalized answers with more context.

name: Dona - Simple tasks
tagline: Free minimalist task management app for iOS
description: Meet Dona: my new, free, minimalist iOS task management app! Designed for daily simplicity, it works offline and integrates with the iPhone ecosystem (Siri, widgets). No payment, no ads, no tracking. Download it and let me know what you think!

name: Riveo (Mac)
tagline: The video editor that loves you back. Now on the mac.
description: Create visuals. Unlike any other. For iPhone and iPad.

name: BrandKiit
tagline: Create your brand instantly using AI. Look different.
description: Naming your product shouldn‚Äôt take days. Brandkiit uses AI to generate your brand ‚Äî name, logo, tagline, slogan, colors, fonts, available domain, and even an email signature ‚Äî all in seconds. Download a ready-to-use CSS file, no more vibe-coded clones.

name: Murmur Lab
tagline: The first AI PM workspace by Currents AI
description: Discover long-tail, real-time conversations from your customers before your competitors do.

name: Done-Copilot
tagline: Manage all your tasks and teams directly from Whatsapp.
description: Manage teams, assign tasks to your team and get real-time updates directly from your AI-Powered WhatsApp Copilot. All in natural language - no matter what language you speak. And no more manual task creation, no additional apps needed or long onboarding time.

name: ScaleUp Horizon
tagline: Financial & fundraising command center for Indian startups
description: Web site created using create-react-appStop managing your startup with 47 browser tabs. All-in-one platform for Indian founders: financial forecasting, investor pipeline, fundraising tools & KPI dashboards. Built for INR-USD ops & Indian compliance.
